🌟 NatureQuest Documentation Hub

Welcome to the comprehensive documentation center for the NatureQuest ecosystem - a suite of AI-powered development and learning tools.

Quick Navigation: 📚 Learning Roadmap • 🏗️ Architecture • 📖 All Documentation

🎯 Product Ecosystem

🧠 DevMentor

AI Development Assistant with pattern learning capabilities. Features infrastructure automation, Kubernetes management, and intelligent code analysis.

Status: Beta - 200+ documentation files

🎓 QuizMentor

Adaptive Learning Platform that personalizes education through AI-driven quizzes and gamification systems.

Status: Live - 70+ documentation files

🌾 Harvest.ai

Content Intelligence Platform for smart time tracking, project management, and developer productivity analytics.

Status: Development - 15+ documentation files

🔐 NatureQuest Auth

Unified Authentication system providing single sign-on across the entire ecosystem with advanced security features.

Status: Beta - Unified SSO

🏗️ Infrastructure

System Architecture documentation covering Kubernetes, service mesh, monitoring, and deployment patterns.

Focus: Kubernetes, Istio, Observability

Complete Index of all 256+ documentation files across products, organized by category and searchable.
